R

Run - Class in com.bignerdranch.android.runtracker
A class representing a single run being tracked by this application.
Run() - Constructor for class com.bignerdranch.android.runtracker.Run
Creates a new Run with an invalid ID.
RunActivity - Class in com.bignerdranch.android.runtracker
Activity for displaying the status of a single run.
RunActivity() - Constructor for class com.bignerdranch.android.runtracker.RunActivity
 
RunDatabaseHelper - Class in com.bignerdranch.android.runtracker
Creates and upgrades a database for storing Runs and the locations associated with Runs.
RunDatabaseHelper(Context) - Constructor for class com.bignerdranch.android.runtracker.RunDatabaseHelper
Creates a new RunDatabaseHelper with the given context.
RunDatabaseHelper.LocationCursor - Class in com.bignerdranch.android.runtracker
A convenience class to wrap a cursor that returns rows from the "location" table.
RunDatabaseHelper.LocationCursor(Cursor) - Constructor for class com.bignerdranch.android.runtracker.RunDatabaseHelper.LocationCursor
Creates a LocationCursor wrapping the given cursor.
RunDatabaseHelper.RunCursor - Class in com.bignerdranch.android.runtracker
A convenience class to wrap a cursor that returns rows from the "run" table.
RunDatabaseHelper.RunCursor(Cursor) - Constructor for class com.bignerdranch.android.runtracker.RunDatabaseHelper.RunCursor
Creates a RunCursor wrapping the given cursor.
RunFragment - Class in com.bignerdranch.android.runtracker
Fragment to display information about a single run.

RunListActivity - Class in com.bignerdranch.android.runtracker

RunListFragment - Class in com.bignerdranch.android.runtracker

RunManager - Class in com.bignerdranch.android.runtracker
Singleton class that manages the communication with the LocationManager and details about the current run.
